updates.title: Gemini 3 vs. Claude Opus 4.5 vs. GPT-5.1 Codex: Which AI model is the best designer?
updates.description: Watch now | ️ Testing Gemini 3, Opus 4.5, and GPT-5.1 Codex on the same redesign task to see which AI model is the best designer. The winner is clear.

updates.title: The Jaguar rebrand – one year on
updates.description: One year ago today, I hit publish on a story about Jaguar’s rebrand. There seemed to be an interesting strategy behind it and the visuals were unusual, so I thought it might get some attention. That it did.
